answer.content:
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Weighted Graph Visualization</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            height: 100vh;
            background-color: #f0f0f0;
        }
        #canvas {
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            background-color: #fff;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <canvas id="canvas" width="600" height="400"></canvas>

    <script>
        // Graph Data
        const nodes = [
            { id: 1, x: 100, y: 100 },
            { id: 2, x: 200, y: 200 },
            { id: 3, x: 300, y: 100 },
            { id: 4, x: 400, y: 200 },
            { id: 5, x: 500, y: 100 }
        ];

        const edges = [
            { from: 1, to: 2, weight: 4 },
            { from: 1, to: 3, weight: 3 },
            { from: 2, to: 4, weight: 2 },
            { from: 3, to: 4, weight: 5 },
            { from: 4, to: 5, weight: 1 }
        ];

        const canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
        const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

        // Draw Nodes
        function drawNode(node) {
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.arc(node.x, node.y, 20, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            ctx.fillStyle = '#3498db';
            ctx.fill();
            ctx.strokeStyle = '#2980b9';
            ctx.stroke();
            ctx.fillStyle = '#ffffff';
            ctx.font = '16px Arial';
            ctx.textAlign = 'center';
            ctx.fillText(node.id, node.x, node.y + 6);
        }

        // Draw Edges
        function drawEdge(edge) {
            const fromNode = nodes.find(node => node.id === edge.from);
            const toNode = nodes.find(node => node.id === edge.to);
            
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.moveTo(fromNode.x, fromNode.y);
            ctx.lineTo(toNode.x, toNode.y);
            ctx.strokeStyle = '#2c3e50';
            ctx.lineWidth = edge.weight;
            ctx.stroke();
            
            // Calculate mid-point for labeling
            const midX = (fromNode.x + toNode.x) / 2;
            const midY = (fromNode.y + toNode.y) / 2;
            
            ctx.fillStyle = '#e74c3c';
            ctx.font = '14px Arial';
            ctx.fillText(`W:${edge.weight}`, midX, midY - 6);
        }

        // Initialization
        function init() {
            ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
            edges.forEach(drawEdge);
            nodes.forEach(drawNode);
        }

        // Execute graph drawing
        init();
    </script>
</body>
</html>

messages.content: Generate a single HTML file with JavaScript demonstrating the user-given concept. Only respond in a single HTML file.
